Articles.Content:
In the advanced menu in the VAB a custom category keeps being created.  I can delete it but unlike normal customs I get no "are you sure" box when I hit delete, then it continues to come back.  Its annoying because whenever it reappears it puts the little + icon next to all the parts.

Here's a screenshot of the category in question, with he cursor next to it.  As you can see it is VariantThemes however the stock category is spelled Variant Themes with a space.


Edited May 16, 2018 by KSPNoob
Anyone?, it just keeps coming back, very annoying.

1. If you ignore it will bad things happen? E.g. stuff gets hit by kraken? If no, there is no urgency to fix it.

2. Did you check your files/mods? Mods may be outdated, or just a duplication of a file that you may have accidentally copied.
